text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse You're going to watch the cases doubling every 2-3 days. It's not going to stop in 15 days. It's not even going to plateau by then, not when you're ready to end what limited steps you've taken to date.

All because you still don't get the need to aggressively test for covid19
